base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with two doors.
part_description: Two rectangular doors with vertical handles, positioned symmetrically on the front. The cabinet has a flat top, sides, and back, with a hollow interior.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged to the sides of the cabinet, allowing them to swing open and closed. The handles provide a grip for easy opening. The interior is spacious, designed to hold items securely when the doors are closed.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a counter. It interacts with users who open the doors to access stored items. The flat top can support additional objects or decorations.
